revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=BeagleBoard.org |model=BeagleBone |revision=Rev A6 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |manuf=CircuitCo |availability=discontinued |price=89 |est_release_date=05/2012 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=Sitara AM3359;XAM3359AZCZ; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT47H128M16RT-25E:C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pad header,, unpopulated,, P7 |serial=yes,, console port,, USB Female Mini-B,, (115200 8N1) |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN8710A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2-Port USB 2.0 Hi-Speed Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2412;;1;,,, Dual USB UART/FIFO Controller;FTDI;FT2232L;;1;,,, Single Chip PMIC;Texas Instruments;TPS65217B;;1;,,, 256Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;ON Semi;CAT24C256;;1;,,, 2K Microwire Serial EEPROM;Microchip;93LC56B;;1;,,, Current-Limited, Power-Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2051;;1;,,, Over-voltage Protection Controller;ON Semiconductor;NCP349;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Regulator;Texas Instruments;TPS73701;;1;,,, 4-Channel ESD Solution for USB;TI;TPD4S012;;1;,,, Dual Buffer and Driver w/Open-Drain Outputs;TI;SN74LVC2G07;;1;, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, I2C, SPI, GPIO, UART |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.04;-dirty; |stock_os=Linux;3.8.11;Angstrom v2012.12; |tp_firmware=Debian |default_ip=192.168.7.2 |default_user=root |default_pass=''blank'' }} {{TagLine|BeagleBone}} :[https://www.beagleboard.org/boards/beaglebone-original Product page]
{{See also|BeagleBoard Devices|List of SBCs}}
The board can be powered by 2 different methods: *5V/1A power supply plugged into the connector *USB Female Micro-B 5V/1A
===Links=== *[https://elinux.org/BeagleBone_Community#BeagleBone_.28original.29 ''BeagleBone (original)'' on '''Embedded Linux Wiki'''] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BeagleBoard#BeagleBone ''BeagleBone'' on '''Wikipedia''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[TI]]'' AM3359 ARM (Cortex-A8) @720MHz *Storage: TF card (32GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) SDRAM ([[Micron]]) *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power: 5V/1A via barrel
===See also=== :https://beagleboard.org/boards *[[BeagleBone Black]] • [https://beagleboard.org/black PPage] *[[BeagleBone Blue]] • [https://beagleboard.org/blue PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green|BeagleBone Green]] • [http://www.seeedstudio.com/wiki/Beaglebone_green PPage] *[[SeeedStudio BeagleBone Green Wireless|BeagleBone Green WiFi]] • [https://www.seeedstudio.com/SeeedStudio-BeagleBone-Green-Wireless-p-2650.html PPage] *[[BeagleBoard X15]] • [https://beagleboard.org/x15 PPage] *[[BeagleBoard xM]] • [https://beagleboard.org/beagleboard-xm PPage] *[[PocketBeagle]] • [https://beagleboard.org/pocket PPage]
